author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 27-year-old worker of Chennai Corporation drowned in Adambakkam Lake on Friday morning. Chinnakutti was walking along the lake bund when he slipped and fell into it. Firemen retrieved Chinnakutti’s body later in the day, Adambakkam police said.

Couple robbed

18 sovereigns of gold jewels were stolen from a couple on a suburban train on Friday. Railway police said Manoharan, a railway employee from Secunderabad, and his wife, were travelling by a train to Chennai Central after attending a wedding in Tiruvannamalai. They alighted from a MTC bus and boarded a crowded train at Perungalathur. At Tambaram, they noticed their hand luggage torn and the jewels robbed. Government Railway Police, Tambaram, are investigating.

Fire destroys house

Five motorcycles and household appliances were destroyed in a fire that broke out in a hut at Rajaji Nagar in Rajakilpakkam near Tambaram on Thursday. No one was injured. A short-circuit in Jagadeesh Yesuraj's house lead to the fire which charred the vehicles and an air-conditioning unit, Selaiyur police said.
title: Corporation worker drowns in lake
